runs.comm: good length on a line just outside off stump, Guptill lets it pass
touch fuller, Tamin forward to block towards cover
that one kept a bit low around off stump after pitching on a good length, Guptill stays in his crease and plays towards cover point
left alone outside off stump, the ball swung away from the right-hander from short of a length
Mortaza's ruined a good start by spraying the ball so wide down leg side that the wicketkeeper had no chance
too straight this time and Guptill pushes the ball through the gap at midwicket, they have time to run three
good length and straight, Franklin gets behind the line and defends
wide line outside off stump, just inside those tram lines, Guptill lets it go
good length outside off stump, closer line this time, Guptill strides forward and shoulders arms
that's a golf swing and Guptill's made tremendous contact, he came forward and carted the ball high and far over long-on, that ball took ages to land in the stands
good length on off and middle stump, defended on the off side
worked off the pads behind square for a single
Franklin moves forward and opens the face to steer a length ball behind point
good length just outside off stump, Franklin stays in his crease and blocks
Franklin uses some width outside off stump to cut but can't beat point
a slower ball but the line is on the pads, Franklin glances through square leg

Guptill gets hit on the box by a short of a length ball that nips into him, he came forward and tried to swivel-pull but misses. He takes a second or several to catch his breath. Down on his haunches, is Guptill
another short ball, Guptill stays back this time and works the ball behind square
the full slower ball hits Franklin on the pads after he misses the flick, I suspect that pitched outside leg so Mortaza's appeal is turned down
angled into the right-hander's off and middle stump, Guptill moves forward and plays to cover
strays down leg side this time, Guptill moves inside the line and lets the ball go

he's missed a straight ball and is bowled! Guptill moved forward to defend but played down the wrong line and left a sizeable gap between bat and pad. The ball went through it. Hasn't taken long for the trial by spin to take effect.
fuller length outside off stump, McCullum drives to cover
McCullum strides forward and blocks towards the bowler
pushed towards mid-on off the front foot where there's a mis-field that allows the single
driven to long-on for a single
width outside off stump and Franklin uses it to cut past point, where Mahmudullah lets the ball through
a slower ball on the pads and Franklin misses the flick, the ball goes off his pad on the leg side
good length outside off stump, punched off the front foot to cover
superb placement and timing, McCullum jumps back to a length ball and punches through the small gap at cover
he moves back again and plays the good length ball to cover
pushed past the bowler towards mid-on
McCullum leans forward and nudges the ball towards mid-on, who is on the edge of the circle
quicker ball on the pads, worked through midwicket for a single
McCullum moves forward to defend but gets an outside edge towards short third man, Franklin calls him through for a quick single
pushed off the front foot towards long-on, Franklin is just looking for these singles and getting them so far
worked off the pads behind square for a single
Franklin moved outside leg stump, exposing all his stumps, and then cut the ball to point for no run. Lots of risk for little reward
McCullum strides forward and slaps a length ball from Shafiul over cover. There was lots of width outside off and McCullum freed his arms and whacked it

good length angling into the right-hander, McCullum taps it to midwicket and runs a quick single. Mortaza runs in from midwicket, picks up and lets the throw rip at the bowler's end. There's no one backing up so New Zealand get four overthrows. Shafiul has hands on his head
beaten by a good length ball outside off stump
Franklin hits the ball through cover for another single
full and straight, McCullum plays the drive past the bowler towards mid-off
Franklin was looking to whip on the leg side but got an inside edge on to pad and the ball went towards point
McCullun gets an inside edge on the leg side for a single
Franklin nudges the ball as it slides across him from round the wicket, guiding it past short third man
gets hit on the pad and the ball goes on the leg side
comes out of his crease to drive the ball to long off, he stepped out early
shot! McCullum charges the bowler and drives the ball with the turn over cover, getting under it and hitting it flat over the boundary. He reached away from his body to make contact
played to deep midwicket for a single
played off the back foot through point for a single

Franklin's very lucky! He came down the pitch and swung, trying to hit inside out over cover. He missed but got a tiny inside edge that took the ball past leg stump and the keeper, and to the boundary
pushed to long on for a single
a short ball and McCullum pulls through square leg, Nasir slides and chests the ball down to the fielder running from deep midwicket
McCullum unfurls the reverse sweep and places it past the fielder at short third man
tossed up outside off stump, pushed off the front foot through point
defended from the crease on the off side
punched towards the bowler off the back foot.
shorter length and McCullum pulls towards deep square leg
Franklin moves forward and chips the ball towards midwicket
Franklin steps out and swings this time, lofting the ball towards wide long-on, Nasir Hossain runs to his left and leaps but can't reach the ball. Franklin placed that well for a one-bounce four
pushed off the front foot through cover
Franklin drives the ball to cover
slogs the ball towards long-on, the ball reaches the fielder on the bounce
nudged off the pads to short fine leg and Franklin calls for the quick run, Shafiul fumbles the pick-up
worked off the pads through square leg
that's high and far and the ball's landed on the grass banks beyond the midwicket boundary. McCullum charged Shakib and swung hard, making superb contact with the arm ball
Shakib got that ball to turn after pitching on middle but McCullum was good in defence, staying back and playing late
played off the back foot towards wide mid-on
that's too short and McCullum's smashed the pull off the back foot, hitting it flat for a one-bounce four
moves forward this time and sweeps the ball hard and flat to the fielder at deep backward square leg, gets to him on the bounce
superb timing, Franklin moves forward and lofts the ball cleanly over the bowler's head, not as powerful as Baz but effective nonetheless
defended back to the bowler
worked off the pads through midwicket for a single
width given outside off stump, Franklin moves forward and drives through cover
that's just too short and McCullum puts it away to the square leg boundary with a whippy pull, he gets to a rapid fifty, off 29 balls
nudged on the leg side for a single
cut off the back foot through the off side
rubbish ball, on the pads and nearly outside them, McCullum glances and gets bat on the ball to send it racing to the fine-leg boundary
length ball outside off stump, punched off the back foot to long-off
McCullum misses the slog sweep but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Franklin goes back to try and work the ball through square but misses and is hit on the pad
Franklin mis-times the slog to midwicket and sprints the single
McCullum steps out of his crease and bottom-edges a flatter ball into the pitch
charges the bowler again but makes less-than-perfect contact, hitting the ball along the ground to long-on
Franklin backs away outside leg and hits the ball inside out along the ground to long off

length ball and Franklin's hit it straight to Nasir Hossain at deep midwicket, he made good contact but just placed it poorly. New Zealand won't mind this dismissal too much though, with the likes of Taylor and Oram to come ...
full ball on the pads, Taylor misses the glance but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye behind square

what sort of shot is that? McCullum charged the bowler, Mortaza dropped it short outside off stump and McCullum played a tennis fore-hand from above his head over the long-off boundary. And it's not a small boundary either
worked off the pads through midwicket
hit off the back foot through cover point
Taylor tries to work the ball through the leg side but gets a little leading edge
tossed up outside off stump, McCullum drives through cover
Taylor moves across and nudges the ball towards long-on for a single
bowled outside off stump, McCullum reaches for it and hits to long-on
cut off the back foot towards point
Mortaza dives to his right at short third man and cuts off Taylor's cut off the back foot
McCullum charges the bowler and drives hard to the fielder on the edge of the circle at cover, he doesn't make a clean stop
Shafiul sees McCullum charge down the pitch and bowls a slower one wide outside off, McCullum lunges to try and reach it but misses
how has that gone for six? I thought it went straight up in the air! But it had not. McCullum went down the pitch and threw his bat at a slower ball, clearing two fielders on the straight boundary
McCullum clears his front foot and slogs at a length ball, getting an inside edge past his leg stump to the fine leg boundary. He has a 100 in his sights ...
he is on fire ... McCullum backs away towards leg and slaps a short ball from outside off stump over point, one-bounce four
McCullum is on the front foot, well out of his crease, as he pulls a short ball to long on
Taylor has width and he cuts hard, but can't beat the fielder at point
McCullum moved across his crease and clubbed the ball flat and hard to the straight boundary
short and wide outside off stump, McCullum hits hard from his crease to the fielder on the cover boundary
Taylor swings across the line and hits the ball towards deep square leg. Shakib's had a shocker today
you cannot bowl full tosses to Taylor, he moves towards the off side and lofts it into the gap at cow corner, he'll hit those balls for four in his sleep
and you can't allow Taylor to hit across the line either, Shakib gets smashed to the square leg boundary
Taylor misses the slog-sweep and gets hit on the pad, Shakib finishes a horrendous spell, 4-0-40-0 from Bangladesh's key player
he's been dropped at extra cover! McCullum charged down the pitch and hit the ball very hard but straight to Mortaza at a very catchable height
nudged from his crease towards mid-on for a single, the bowler runs after the ball
a friendly full toss outside off stump, McCullum lines it up and slaps the ball over Mortaza at extra cover for four

McCullum gets to his hundred by pulling a short ball to the cow corner boundary, he's shredded Bangladesh today, he takes his helmet off and waves his bat to the crowd. Terrific innings, he's played only 9 dot balls
what a mismatch this is now, McCullum charges again and carts the ball straight over the bowler's head
the reverse sweep but McCullum can't beat point, he keeps the strike though
fetch it from the grass banks beyond midwicket, go on. McCullum just rocks back and heaves a short ball for his sixth six.
charges down the pitch and drives the ball to long-on
Taylor gives the strike back by driving past the bowler for a single
McCullum steps out again but has to reach wide outside off stump to slice the ball past point
fetch it again, McCullum moves forward and across, gets down on one knee on the front foot and slog-sweeps on to those grass banks

he's been caught off the final ball, throwing his bat at a wide ball and slicing it to the fielder running in from the cover boundary. He's absolutely battered Bangladesh and they look every bit a team that's had do do some serious leather hunting. McCullum's 123 is the highest T20 international score
